objects.text:
• Edge-to-edge OLED Display
• Advanced Face ID Technology
• Premium Aluminum & Glass Build
• 5G Ready Connectivity

Super Retina XDR Display
Wireless Charging Capability

product_details.name: Premium iPhone - Sleek Design, Limitless Possibilities
product_details.description:
• Edge-to-edge OLED display with stunning clarity
• Iconic notch design housing advanced Face ID technology
• Slim, premium aluminum and glass construction
• Super Retina XDR display with true blacks
• Precision-engineered curved edges for comfortable grip
• Advanced facial recognition security system
• Bezel-less design maximizing screen real estate
• Compatible with latest iOS updates
• Perfect for photography, gaming, and productivity
• Supports wireless charging capability
• 5G ready for ultra-fast connectivity
• Available in multiple storage configurations

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern, tech-inspired layout divided into four quadrants, creating a clean, grid-based design. The top-left quadrant showcases a bold title ("heading") and a sleek tagline ("tagline") in white sans-serif fonts over a deep navy-blue background with circular accents and subtle grid lines. The right half is mostly minimal, housing a centered smartphone image ("product_image") to draw attention.

The bottom-left quadrant highlights product features ("description"), a bold price tag ("price"), and a strong call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta") in light blue. The bottom-right contains a promotional subtitle ("offer_text") and secondary device features ("features").

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #0A3D62
- Light Blue: #3498DB
- White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray Background: #F5F5F5
- Dark Overlay Accent: #0F2945
product_color: The product image features a sleek smartphone with a minimalist design, emphasizing a clean black frame and a bright white screen. The dominant colors are pure white (#FFFFFF) for the screen and deep black (#000000) for the frame. These contrasting tones give the product a modern, high-tech appearance. The subtle gradient reflections on the black edges add depth and sophistication without overpowering the primary tones. For advertisement banners, complementary neutral tones such as steel gray (#4F4F4F), cool silver (#C0C0C0), and light charcoal (#2E2E2E) can be used to highlight the premium nature of the device while maintaining visual clarity.
